title: Towards the Next!

Rina-chan Board says, â€œBlush.â€<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Rina, you too, stop it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But you know, the fun things arenâ€™t forgotten once youâ€™re â€œon shoreâ€!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Thatâ€™s right. Iâ€™ll never forget those memories, and Iâ€™ll always treasure them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Itâ€™d be great if we could keep making lots of memories like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! Memories are treasures that last a lifetime!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Then, letâ€™s do even more live concerts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I agree with Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Shioriko-chan, please give us permission to use the auditorium~ ğ…  I want to hold a concert right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Hehe.
